subject: Public Speaking
title: Joan of Arc: Speaking with Conviction
description: One-minute skill: Joan of Arc: Speaking with Conviction.

hook.text: Joan of Arc was illiterate. Yet she swayed armies through conviction.

buildup.text: Her certainty and belief in her mission made soldiers follow.

discovery.text: Conviction sometimes matters more than eloquence or credentials.

twist.text: Her enemies recognized conviction is harder to defeat than armies.

climax.text: Spiritual certainty expressed simply can move masses.

punchline.text: Conviction beats credentials. Belief beats eloquence.
